to share tech about this character on Twitter

column8: Black Wings of Ruin by Applay
column12: u+1+2 ⏵ uf+1 ⏵ MCR 3 T! ⏵ uf+1 ⏵ MCR 4,2,1U

column2:
Can perform EWGF without perfect input
Some moves gain a new follow-up during Heat
His Hellsweep gains an enhanced follow-up
column7: Risky but very evasive heat engager.
Safe mid attack that crushes lows very early in its animation.
Mostly useful in punish situations.

Very useful as an approach tool and to control space 
 in the midrange.

Unsafe heat engager from Mourning Crow stance. 
 It can be used against opponents that try to interrupt your 
 stance follow-ups.

column12: u+1+2 ⏵ uf+1 ⏵ MCR 3 T! ⏵ uf+1 ⏵ MCR 4,2,1U

column7:
Fast attack to start offense and check situations. 
 1,1 can be used for poking and hit confirm into 1,1,2.

Mid poke to check situations. Use its extensions sparringly 
 to check opponents that like to retaliate your df+1.
Low poke to harass the opponent.

A safe mid counterhit launcher that can also be used to 
  hit grounded opponents.

A long ranged high attack. Use this from midrange to 
 discourage opponents from using their keepout moves. 
 On hit, it guarantees a MCR 2,2.

Strong okizeme tool. Hold the input to charge the 
 attack and time it with the moment the opponent stands up.  
 If fully charged, it causes a guard break for a 1,1,2 follow-up.

Safe mid attack that can be used to fish for counterhits 
 when approaching opponents.

Risky low that knocks down into a strong combo. 
 It's the cornerstone of Devil Jin's mixup game.

_A high launching attack with many applications in the neutral
 It's important for punishment, but can be used for approach
 and as a keepout button. Don't neglect it.

column12: b,f+2,1,df+2 T! ⏵ MCR 3 (low wall hit) ⏵ b+4

column6:
EWGF speed depends on player's execution
It can punish -13 moves, but is more practical against -15 attacks

column12:
After tornado, you can use b+2,3 for short distance and
(f+3) MCR 4,1 for long and high wallsplat carry.

column7: STANDING

column12: f,f+2 for wall break and MCR 1 to break floor

column7:
df+1,2
df+4,4 (range)
b+2,3 (heat)

d+3+4
EWGF
uf+3+4 (range)
